***** BIG UPDATE *****
We've removed some ads.
Add notifications to let you know each day the weather without opening the app.

- The last city you see in a session will be the first city you'll see next time you'll open the app.

IMPORTANT INFO : We have fixed the error that occured last days. We are very sorry about it and have improved our systems to avoid this to happen again.

New UI to better organize your cities :)
Data are collected another way, and the app have never been so accurate!

New feature : Radar & Maps !
New feature : Radar & Maps !

Our goal is to create the most powerful Weather app on iPhone.
Please find in this update new awesome features that are making our app even more complete.

For our premium users :
- we are one of the only weather apps that now support a 14 days daily forecast and 2 days hourly forecast !

For all our users :
- you can access directly to a forecast from the list of your cities

As always, if you need help with subscription, pro or standard product, feel free to contact our fast-reacting support

Our goal is to create the most powerful Weather app on iPhone.
Please find in this update new awesome features that are making our app even more complete.
For our premium users :
- we improved radar & maps feature
- we are one of the only weather apps that now support a 14 days daily forecast and 2 days hourly forecast !
For all our users :
- you have now the weather of your location if you have enabled it
- you can now enable/disable the notifications from the app and change the alert time
- you can access directly to a forecast from the list of your cities
As always, if you need help with subscription, pro or standard product, feel free to contact our fast-reacting support

Discover this brand new version of Weather, the most complete weather app on iOS.
We spend a lot of time to build this completely new app :
- a brand new design, more modern and comprehensible
- several new radar
- alerts and hurricane tracker
- a more accurate forecast
- the app is now amazingly fast

Feel free to send us your feedbacks

In this version we've updated a lot the UI and the UX.
You have now a more dynamic UI that let you use the app in a better way.
You have also more flexibility in the choice of the units used for the different data. It gives you the opportunity to custom it and to be "your app".
We've also added the UV-index in the hourly forecasts.
